name: ANTSUseLandmarkImagesToGetBSplineDisplacementField
author: ANTs Developers
description: We expect the input images to be (1) N-ary (2) in the same physical space as the images you want to register and (3) to have the same landmark points defined within them. Landmarks will be defined from the center of mass of the labels in the input images. You can use ITK-snap to generate the label images. The optional landmarks weights are read from a text file where each row is either: "label,labelWeight" or "labelWeight". If the latter format is used, the label weights are assumed to be arranged in ascending order by label.

inputs.name: Fixed Image With Labeled Landmarks
inputs.description: The fixed image with labeled landmarks.

inputs.name: Moving Image With Labeled Landmarks
inputs.description: The moving image with labeled landmarks.

inputs.name: Mesh Size
inputs.description: The mesh size specified as meshSize[0]xmeshSize[1]x...

inputs.name: Number of Levels
inputs.description: The number of levels in the B-spline hierarchy.

inputs.name: Polynomial Order
inputs.description: The order of the B-spline (default is 3).

inputs.name: Enforce Stationary Boundaries
inputs.description: Whether to enforce stationary boundaries (default is 1).

inputs.name: Landmark Weights
inputs.description: Optional text file containing landmark weights. Each row is either "label,labelWeight" or "labelWeight". If the latter format is used, the weights are assumed to be arranged in ascending order by label.

output-files.name: Displacement Field
output-files.description: The resultant displacement field for the registration process.
